rows.label: tev012301_SEL0031
rows.name:
Ask Howard about ways to protect
yourself from the weather.

rows.label: tev012301_MSG0001
rows.name: Transporting cargo on a helicopter is not easy work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012301_MSG0002
rows.name:
When piloting a chopper, you gotta keep an eye on
atmospheric pressure, wind pressure, and all sorts of
other little aspects of the weather.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012301_MSG0003
rows.name:
And here on Mira, there are even more things that can
go wrong when flying a helicopter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012301_MSG0004
rows.name:
For example, you have to try to anticipate the
movement of indigens like auravises and millesaurs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012301_MSG0005
rows.name:
Since no one got hurt and the cargo survived, 
Roscoe was able to make it through the ordeal
with his reputation intact.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012301_MSG0006
rows.name:
BLADE lives are precious, but so are helicoptersâ€”not
to mention the cargo. We can't be risking any of that
without good reason.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012301_MSG0007
rows.name:
So I really need Ciska to start taking her work
more seriously.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012301_MSG0008
rows.name:
Hopefully this experience will be a wake-up call
to start maturing a little bit as a BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012301_MSG0009
rows.name:
I've heard the arms manufacturers are developing a
range of augments that can be affixed to your gear
in order to provide protection from weather effects.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012301_MSG0010
rows.name:
I sure hope they aren't just for ground gear and Skells,
but can be applied to helicopters as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012301_MSG0011
rows.name:
Regardless, I'd love to get my hands on a prototype.
Maybe we should invest in the companies that are
developing them?[ST:wait ]
